definition: serial number and position on the dike per year

definition: serial numer of a pair of plots (water and landside)

comment: Chytrý et al. (2020) EUNIS Habitat Classification: Expert system, characteristic species combinations and distribution maps of European habitats. - Applied Vegetation Science 23, 648-675. https://doi.org/10.1111/avsc.12519

attributeDefinition: Which European habitat type according to the Bavarian guideline (LfU & LWF 2018)
comment: LfU (Bayersiches Landesamt fuer Umwelt) & LWF (Bayersiche Landesanstalt fuer Forstwirtschaft) (2018) Handbuch der Lebensraumtypen nach Anhang I der FFH-Richtlinie in Bayern.

attributeDefinition: Which 'biotope and land use types' according to the "Bayerischen Kompensationsverordnung" (BayKompV) (LfU 2014)
comment: LfU (Bayerisches Landesamt fuer Umwelt) (2014) Bayerische Kompensationsverordnung (BayKompV). Arbeitshilfe zur Biotopwertliste. Verbale Kurzbeschreibungen.
